arts.ttl: Third win for Mallorca in ten days
arts.sum: Just before the hour mark, Dani Rodriguez put a magical pass over the home defence’s heads which Larin controlled like a gymnast without it touching the ground to lash in the opener against his old club. The star for Mallorca was undoubtedly the much-maligned Cyle Larin who, at last, got on the scoresheet with the goal he and us fans have been waiting an eternity for and it was a belter.

arts.ttl: Mallorca keep up La Liga winning streak at Real Valladolid
arts.sum: Mallorca stretched their La Liga winning run to three games in a 2-1 victory at Real Valladolid. The visitors were forced to survive some late pressure at the Estadio Jose Zorrilla but they came out on top in a chaotic final ten minutes. Real Valladolid were denied by the post early on with Mallorca missing […] The post Mallorca keep up La Liga winning streak at Real Valladolid appeared first on Football España.
The Madrid derby takes centre stage in LaLiga this weekend and Joe Champion has score predictions for that contest and all the other tussles in the Spanish top flight.

arts.ttl: Best start in five seasons for Mallorca
arts.sum: Last season under ultra defensive Mexican coach Javier Aguirre, if Mallorca had gone a goal down away from home after just six minutes (as they did last Monday night), we’d have seen 10 Mallorca players knuckle down to defence mode. One player who’s arrived on a season-long loan from Real Sociedad and has a great future is 22-year-old right winger Robert Navarro .

arts.ttl: Mallorca fan sentenced to prison for racial abuse of Real Madrid star Vinicius Junior
arts.sum: A Mallorca supporter who racially abused Vinicius Junior and Samuel Chukwueze has been found guilty by Spanish courts and sentenced to 12 months in prison, as well as a three-year stadium ban. The initial supporter sentenced marks the third criminal conviction handed down in recent months for racist insults received by Real Madrid players.

arts.ttl: Mallorca fan sentenced for Vinícius racist abuse
arts.sum: A Mallorca fan who hurled racists insults at Real Madrid forward Vinícius Júnior and Villarreal Samu Chukwueze has been handed a 12-month suspended sentence by a Spanish court.

arts.ttl: Vinícius Jr. responds as Mallorca fan hit with prison sentence for racial abuse
arts.sum: Another major step in the right direction in the ongoing fight against racism in Spanish football has on Thursday been confirmed. This comes by way of the announcement of a…
